headline: Is LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (LYB) the Best High Growth Chemical Stock to Buy?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 High Growth Chemical Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where LyondellBasell Industries N.V. headline: Lyondell to lay off 86% of workforce at shuttered Houston refinery, filing shows
summary: HOUSTON (Reuters) -Lyondell Basell Industries' will lay off 345 workers, or 86% of the workforce, at its shuttered Houston refinery on April 17, according to a filing with the Texas Workforce Commission.  There are around 400 Lyondell employees working at the 263,776 barrel-per-day Houston refinery.  About 70% of them are hourly workers represented by the United Steelworkers union (USW).

headline: Saudi Arabia’s Ministry of Energy awards prestigious feedstock allocation for joint project between Sipchem and LyondellBasell
summary: Award marks important milestone in feasibility study of Saudi-based world-scale steam cracker and derivativesAL KHOBAR, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and HOUSTON, Feb. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sipchem and LyondellBasell (LYB) have been awarded a feedstock allocation from the Ministry of Energy of Saudi Arabia supporting a joint feasibility study for a world-scale mixed feed cracker complex combined with a diversified derivative portfolio.
